pageTitle: Men's Shorts and Swim | Free Shipping at L.L.Bean

seoPageInfo.browserTitle: <title>Men's Shorts and Swim | Free Shipping at L.L.Bean</title>
seoPageInfo.metaDescription: <meta name="description" content="Free Shipping at L.L.Bean. Shop L.L.Bean for Men's shorts and swimwear for  all your summer outfitting needs. " />
seoPageInfo.metaKeywords: <meta name="keywords" content="Men's shorts, cargo shorts, dress shorts, men's swim shorts, men's swimwear, bathing suits" />

bottomBanners.bannerHtml:
Men's Shorts and Swimwear.

Shop L.L.Bean for Men's shorts and swim shorts with lasting style and comfort. From comfortable, easygoing Men's cargo shorts that become instant weekend favorites to dress shorts that look crisp all day at the office, we've got Men's shorts for every day of the week. When the weather heats up, our Men's swim shorts and Men's swimwear are the perfect basics for a day at the beach. Our Men's bathing suits are available in a variety of styles to fit your needs this summer. L.L.Bean Men's shorts and swimwear are made to fit your style and your budget. Men's swimwear is always shipped free and guaranteed to last.
